first_para: Charles George Eustice (born 28 September 1971, Cornwall), known as George Eustice, is a British Conservative Party politician, who was elected at the 2010 general election as the Member of Parliament for Camborne and Redruth, winning by 66 votes.

full.extract:
Charles George Eustice (born 28 September 1971, Cornwall), known as George Eustice, is a British Conservative Party politician, who was elected at the 2010 general election as the Member of Parliament for Camborne and Redruth, winning by 66 votes.
In October 2013, as part of Prime Minister David Cameron's Government reshuffle, Eustice was appointed Parliamentary Under Secretary of State for Farming, Food and the Marine Environment.
full.title: George Eustice
